greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, T(n,k) = sum {j=k..n} A001511(j); = A000012 * (A001511 * 0^(n-k)) * A000012; 1<=k<=n.
example: First few rows of the triangle =
Row 6 = (10, 9, 7, 6, 3, 2) = partial sums of the first 6 terms of the ruler sequence, starting from the right: (1, 2, 1, 3, 1, 2,...).
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Jul 27 2008
